trans-unit.source: An activity that demarcates a transaction boundary.
trans-unit.target: Uma atividade que demarca um limite de transação.

trans-unit.source: When this activity begins executing, a new <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> is started if one does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: Quando essa atividade começa a executar uma nova <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> é iniciado, se ainda não existir.

trans-unit.source: The transaction commits when the activity and all other participants in the transaction have completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: A transação é confirmada quando a atividade e todos os outros participantes na transação foram concluídas com êxito.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A> activity member of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch> activity that is the child of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> will not execute if an unhandled exception propagates past the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> boundary.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A> membro de atividade de um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch> atividade que é o filho de um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> não será executado se uma exceção sem tratamento propaga após o <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> limite.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> activity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> atividade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Basic TransactionScope](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/basic-transactionscope.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [TransactionScope básico](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/basic-transactionscope.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> activity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> atividade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Basic TransactionScope](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/basic-transactionscope.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [TransactionScope básico](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/basic-transactionscope.md) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the workflow should be aborted if the transaction aborts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor que indica se o fluxo de trabalho deve ser anuladas se a transação nulos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workflow should be aborted.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o fluxo de trabalho deve ser cancelado.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é somente leitura em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor é definido em tempo de execução um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> é gerada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" /> executes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a atividade que é agendada quando o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" /> é executado.

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" /> executes.
trans-unit.target: A atividade que é agendado quando o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" /> executa.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é somente leitura em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor é definido em tempo de execução um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> é gerada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel" /> para esse <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel" /> para <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é somente leitura em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor é definido em tempo de execução um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> é gerada.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" /> should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel" /> para este <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" /> deve ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel" /> precisar ser serializado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" /> should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout" /> para este <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" /> deve ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout" /> precisar ser serializado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the timeout period for the transaction used for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> que indica o período de tempo limite para a transação usado para este <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the timeout period for the transaction used for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> que indica o período de tempo limite para a transação usado para este <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é somente leitura em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor é definido em tempo de execução um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> é gerada.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates setting the Timeout property of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> activity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a definição da propriedade de tempo limite de uma <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope> atividade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Basic TransactionScope](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/basic-transactionscope.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é proveniente do [TransactionScope básico](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/basic-transactionscope.md) exemplo.
